Evanston.Fasman Yeshiva High School: Fasman Yeshiva High School, known colloquially as Skokie Yeshiva, is the all-boys high school division of Hebrew Theological College in Skokie, Illinois. As of the 2016-2017 school year, the school has 133 students enrolled in grades 9-12. Fasman Yeshiva offers a dual curriculum of secular and Judaic studies.
